sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO bal_grpuserrel_his (UNIT_ID , UNIT_NAME , GRP_PHONE_NO, GRP_CONTRACT_NO,LOGIN_ACCPET , OP_TIME , LOGIN_NO ,GROUP_ID, UPDATE_TIME) select UNIT_ID , UNIT_NAME , GRP_PHONE_NO, GRP_CONTRACT_NO,#LOGIN_ACCPET#, OP_TIME , LOGIN_NO ,GROUP_ID,sysdate from bal_grpuser_rel where unit_id=#UNIT_ID#
grp_contract_no =#CONTRACT_NO#
grp_phone_no =#PHONE_NO#
